title: Sanjun Gu Grafting Farmers Forum Presentation 2012

subtasks: Introducing Dr. Sanjen Gu as the speaker.
Discussing the research on tomato grafting compatibility with heirloom varieties.
Presenting survival rates of grafted heirloom tomatoes in greenhouse and field settings.
Analyzing stem diameter and graft union success of grafted tomato plants.
Evaluating the impact of high tunnel types (single vs. double layer poly) on grafted heirloom tomatoes.
Sharing 2011 heat wave data and its effect on tomato growth.
Addressing questions on cucumber and melon grafting research.
Recommending online resources and scientific literature for vegetable grafting.
